name: Echo CS-590 Timber Wolf
description: Professional-grade chainsaw with high-performance cutting power, ideal for felling trees and heavy-duty forestry work.

name: Stihl MS 362 C-M
description: Fuel-efficient, smart engine management chainsaw, reliable for forestry professionals.

name: Silky Katanaboy 500mm
description: Heavy-duty folding saw ideal for trail clearing and remote cutting where chainsaws aren't practical.

name: Bahco Bow Saw 30"
description: Strong and versatile bow saw for yard and log cutting. Built for comfort and cutting accuracy.

name: Peterson Horizontal Band Portable Saw Mill
description: Designed for industrial log milling. Mobile, adjustable horizontal bandsaw head. Ideal for professionals.

name: Forestry - Alaskan Mill for Chainsaw
description: Mounts to your chainsaw. Lightweight and portable. Great for DIYers milling slabs on-site.

name: Oregon 20' Bar and Chain
description: Durable 20" Oregon bar and chain combo for efficient cutting and long life.

name: Husqvarna Premix Fuel
description: High-performance 50:1 fuel/oil mix for 2-stroke engines. Cleaner combustion, longer engine life.

name: Oregon File Set
description: Professional file set for sharpening chains. Includes round and flat files for all sizes.
